mapper.select: select ' 合计' as V_BUNAME, sum(N_JAN_PLAN) N_JAN_PLAN, sum(N_JAN_NUM) N_JAN_NUM, sum(N_JAN_AREA) N_JAN_AREA, sum(N_JAN_MONEY/10000) N_JAN_MONEY, sum(N_FEB_PLAN) N_FEB_PLAN, sum(N_FEB_NUM) N_FEB_NUM, sum(N_FEB_AREA) N_FEB_AREA, sum(N_FEB_MONEY/10000) N_FEB_MONEY, sum(N_MAR_PLAN) N_MAR_PLAN, sum(N_MAR_NUM) N_MAR_NUM, sum(N_MAR_AREA) N_MAR_AREA, sum(N_MAR_MONEY/10000) N_MAR_MONEY, sum(N_APR_PLAN) N_APR_PLAN, sum(N_APR_NUM) N_APR_NUM, sum(N_APR_AREA) N_APR_AREA, sum(N_APR_MONEY/10000) N_APR_MONEY, sum(N_MAY_PLAN) N_MAY_PLAN, sum(N_MAY_NUM) N_MAY_NUM, sum(N_MAY_AREA) N_MAY_AREA, sum(N_MAY_MONEY/10000) N_MAY_MONEY, sum(N_JUNE_PLAN) N_JUNE_PLAN, sum(N_JUNE_NUM) N_JUNE_NUM, sum(N_JUNE_AREA) N_JUNE_AREA, sum(N_JUNE_MONEY/10000) N_JUNE_MONEY, sum(N_SBN_PLAN) N_SBN_PLAN, sum(N_SBN_NUM) N_SBN_NUM, sum(N_SBN_AREA) N_SBN_AREA, sum(N_SBN_MONEY/10000) N_SBN_MONEY, sum(N_JULY_PLAN) N_JULY_PLAN, sum(N_JULY_NUM) N_JULY_NUM, sum(N_JULY_AREA) N_JULY_AREA, sum(N_JULY_MONEY/10000) N_JULY_MONEY, sum(N_AUG_PLAN) N_AUG_PLAN, sum(N_AUG_NUM) N_AUG_NUM, sum(N_AUG_AREA) N_AUG_AREA, sum(N_AUG_MONEY/10000) N_AUG_MONEY, sum(N_SEPT_PLAN) N_SEPT_PLAN, sum(N_SEPT_NUM) N_SEPT_NUM, sum(N_SEPT_AREA) N_SEPT_AREA, sum(N_SEPT_MONEY/10000) N_SEPT_MONEY, sum(N_OCT_PLAN) N_OCT_PLAN, sum(N_OCT_NUM) N_OCT_NUM, sum(N_OCT_AREA) N_OCT_AREA, sum(N_OCT_MONEY/10000) N_OCT_MONEY, sum(N_NOV_PLAN) N_NOV_PLAN, sum(N_NOV_NUM) N_NOV_NUM, sum(N_NOV_AREA) N_NOV_AREA, sum(N_NOV_MONEY/10000) N_NOV_MONEY, sum(N_DEC_PLAN) N_DEC_PLAN, sum(N_DEC_NUM) N_DEC_NUM, sum(N_DEC_AREA) N_DEC_AREA, sum(N_DEC_MONEY/10000) N_DEC_MONEY, sum(N_YEAR_PLAN) N_YEAR_PLAN, sum(N_YEAR_NUM) N_YEAR_NUM, sum(N_YEAR_AREA) N_YEAR_AREA, sum(N_YEAR_MONEY/10000) N_YEAR_MONEY from YX_FACT_SALESPLAN WHERE 1 = 1 AND V_PROJNAME not like '%-%' AND V_PROJNAME not like '%期%'

select V_BUNAME, sum(N_JAN_PLAN) N_JAN_PLAN, sum(N_JAN_NUM) N_JAN_NUM, sum(N_JAN_AREA) N_JAN_AREA, sum(N_JAN_MONEY/10000) N_JAN_MONEY, sum(N_FEB_PLAN) N_FEB_PLAN, sum(N_FEB_NUM) N_FEB_NUM, sum(N_FEB_AREA) N_FEB_AREA, sum(N_FEB_MONEY/10000) N_FEB_MONEY, sum(N_MAR_PLAN) N_MAR_PLAN, sum(N_MAR_NUM) N_MAR_NUM, sum(N_MAR_AREA) N_MAR_AREA, sum(N_MAR_MONEY/10000) N_MAR_MONEY, sum(N_APR_PLAN) N_APR_PLAN, sum(N_APR_NUM) N_APR_NUM, sum(N_APR_AREA) N_APR_AREA, sum(N_APR_MONEY/10000) N_APR_MONEY, sum(N_MAY_PLAN) N_MAY_PLAN, sum(N_MAY_NUM) N_MAY_NUM, sum(N_MAY_AREA) N_MAY_AREA, sum(N_MAY_MONEY/10000) N_MAY_MONEY, sum(N_JUNE_PLAN) N_JUNE_PLAN, sum(N_JUNE_NUM) N_JUNE_NUM, sum(N_JUNE_AREA) N_JUNE_AREA, sum(N_JUNE_MONEY/10000) N_JUNE_MONEY, sum(N_SBN_PLAN) N_SBN_PLAN, sum(N_SBN_NUM) N_SBN_NUM, sum(N_SBN_AREA) N_SBN_AREA, sum(N_SBN_MONEY/10000) N_SBN_MONEY, sum(N_JULY_PLAN) N_JULY_PLAN, sum(N_JULY_NUM) N_JULY_NUM, sum(N_JULY_AREA) N_JULY_AREA, sum(N_JULY_MONEY/10000) N_JULY_MONEY, sum(N_AUG_PLAN) N_AUG_PLAN, sum(N_AUG_NUM) N_AUG_NUM, sum(N_AUG_AREA) N_AUG_AREA, sum(N_AUG_MONEY/10000) N_AUG_MONEY, sum(N_SEPT_PLAN) N_SEPT_PLAN, sum(N_SEPT_NUM) N_SEPT_NUM, sum(N_SEPT_AREA) N_SEPT_AREA, sum(N_SEPT_MONEY/10000) N_SEPT_MONEY, sum(N_OCT_PLAN) N_OCT_PLAN, sum(N_OCT_NUM) N_OCT_NUM, sum(N_OCT_AREA) N_OCT_AREA, sum(N_OCT_MONEY/10000) N_OCT_MONEY, sum(N_NOV_PLAN) N_NOV_PLAN, sum(N_NOV_NUM) N_NOV_NUM, sum(N_NOV_AREA) N_NOV_AREA, sum(N_NOV_MONEY/10000) N_NOV_MONEY, sum(N_DEC_PLAN) N_DEC_PLAN, sum(N_DEC_NUM) N_DEC_NUM, sum(N_DEC_AREA) N_DEC_AREA, sum(N_DEC_MONEY/10000) N_DEC_MONEY, sum(N_YEAR_PLAN) N_YEAR_PLAN, sum(N_YEAR_NUM) N_YEAR_NUM, sum(N_YEAR_AREA) N_YEAR_AREA, sum(N_YEAR_MONEY/10000) N_YEAR_MONEY from YX_FACT_SALESPLAN WHERE 1 = 1 AND V_PROJNAME not like '%-%' AND V_PROJNAME not like '%期%' group by V_BUNAME order by N_YEAR_MONEY desc
